articles.title: EAC calls for heightened public awareness to combat spread of Mpox - East African Community
articles.description: The East African Community (EAC) is a regional intergovernmental organisation of eight (8) Partner States, comprising the Republic of Burundi, Democratic Republic of Congo, Republic of Kenya, Republic of Rwanda, Federal Republic of Somalia, Republic of South …
articles.content:
Written on 29 July 2024. Posted in Health
East African Community Headquarters, Arusha, Tanzania, 29th July, 2024:The East African Community (EAC) Secretariat has called on EAC Partner States to educ… [+4853 chars]
